abstract: Federal judge orders Westchester County to hire outside consultant to study barriers to fair housing in its communities as part of ongoing dispute regarding construction of affordable housing units and compliance with 2009 federal consent decree.
lead_paragraph: Following disputes over zoning, a federal judge called the county’s efforts to analyze barriers to fair housing a “failed process.”

headline.main: Westchester Must Hire Consultant for Fair-Housing Study, Judge Rules
headline.print_headline: Westchester Ordered to Hire Consultant for Housing Study

snippet: Following disputes over zoning, a federal judge called the county’s efforts to analyze barriers to fair housing a “failed process.”...
